ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T13:55:35 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 12:22:29. [Issue ID 43829]
ComicInfo.Title: Adam; Moth to the Flame; Mantis!; The High Evolutionary Chapter Three: The Men, the Mine, the Mountain!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The High Evolutionary tasks the Eternals with mapping the Silver Surfer's DNA. Interfering with a battle between SS and the Super-Skrull, the Eternals return the two to earth to complete their mission. The Surfer ends up freeing his old foe and showing the Eternals the error of their ways.
Nova discovers that Galactus is dying and calls the Surfer for help.
Mantis awakens on Earth, finding herself living another life and decides to seek out the Avengers for help.
ComicInfo.StoryArc: Evolutionary War,Saga of the High Evolutionary
